text: Dolina () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Szczytna, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south-west of Szczytna, west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Dolina
title: Dolina, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
